channel.title: 18-Pent-C on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in 18-Pent-C on Sermon Archives

item.title: More Than Skin Deep
item.description: This sermon was from 1983 and was scanned from a hand-typed copy, including a variety of notations in red pencil. If I’m keeping track correctly, this is the 75th sermon that I’ve uploaded.

item.title: One Who Says Thanks
item.description: Here is a handwritten sermon, fresh from 1977. The sermon date is noted as 10/23/1977, and the listed Gospel text is Luke 17: 11-19.
